CHAT.comment: BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF UNIVERSITY OF ALABAMA, ET AL., Petitioners v. PATRICIA GARRETT, ET AL.,
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY S. SUTTON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL GOTTESMAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY S. SUTTON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
